details.title: A Novel Slots-and-Monopole Antenna with a Steerable Cardioid Pattern
details.abstract: The outputs of a vertical monopole and two mutually perpendicular slots in a horizontal plane can be properly combined to yield a steerable cardioid-shaped pattern for vertically polarized waves. The required weighting factors for placing the pattern null in any desired direction are presented in graphical form. The shape and the half-power beamwidth of the steerable pattern are examined. This combination antenna unit offers important advantages in direction finding and other applications, especially at microwave frequencies.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
